statements: SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT rewards FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT customer_id, rewards FROM loyalty_program WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points, rewards, personalized_offers FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points, rewards FROM loyalty_program WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY rewards ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE loyalty_points BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT customer_id, rewards, personalized_offers FROM loyalty_program WHERE rewards LIKE '%gift%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, rewards, personalized_offers FROM loyalty_program WHERE personalized_offers->>'$.discount' = '10%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_points;
SELECT member_id, points_balance FROM loyalty_program_points WHERE member_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE points_required > 500;
SELECT reward_id, reward_name FROM rewards ORDER BY reward_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE validity_period >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_points WHERE points_balance > 100 ORDER BY member_id DESC;
SELECT reward_name, points_required FROM rewards WHERE validity_period >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY reward_id ASC;
SELECT member_id, points_balance FROM loyalty_program_points WHERE member_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND points_balance < 50;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE points_required BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY points_required ASC, reward_id DESC;
SELECT reward_name, validity_period FROM rewards WHERE reward_name LIKE '%bonus%' OR reward_name LIKE '%extra%' ORDER BY validity_period DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_points WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, points FROM loyalty_program_points WHERE points > 100;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE points_required BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT reward_name, points_required FROM rewards WHERE reward_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM personalized_offers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_points ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT reward_name, points_required FROM rewards WHERE points_required > 50;
SELECT customer_id, offer_details FROM personalized_offers WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_id, points FROM loyalty_program_points WHERE customer_id IN (1001, 1003, 1005);
SELECT offer_id, customer_id, offer_details FROM personalized_offers ORDER BY customer_id ASC, offer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE points_required >= 100
SELECT customer_id, points FROM loyalty_program_points WHERE points > 500
SELECT offer_name, discount FROM personalized_offers WHERE discount < 0.2 ORDER BY discount DESC
SELECT reward_name FROM rewards WHERE reward_id = 3
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_level FROM valued_customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT reward_name, points_required FROM rewards WHERE points_required > 100 ORDER BY points_required DESC;
SELECT customer_id, points FROM loyalty_program_points WHERE points < 50 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_level FROM valued_customers WHERE loyalty_level = 'Gold' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT offer_id, offer_name, discount FROM personalized_offers WHERE discount >= 0.2 ORDER BY discount ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_points JOIN valued_customers ON loyalty_program_points.customer_id = valued_customers.customer_id WHERE loyalty_level = 'Platinum' ORDER BY points DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_points;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT reward_name, points_required FROM rewards ORDER BY points_required DESC;
SELECT description FROM personalized_offers WHERE offer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_points;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT offer_name, description FROM personalized_offers ORDER BY offer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, points, last_updated FROM loyalty_program_points WHERE points > 100 ORDER BY points DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
